ProfessionalServices.DismissedNotification: The %1$s menu will no longer be shown, unless the plugin is installed on your Matomo instance.
ProfessionalServices.AbTestingFeature01: Stop guessing, start using data, and compare webpage versions to increase conversions.
ProfessionalServices.AbTestingFeature02: Compare various elements, including layout, design, copy, and more, while monitoring performance in real-time.
ProfessionalServices.AbTestingFeature03: Identify and address visitor behaviour patterns, so you can increase conversion rates and achieve better results from your digital efforts.
ProfessionalServices.CrashAnalyticsFeature02: Automatically track website crashes (e.g. broken carts, unresponsive forms, etc.) for swift bug resolution, so you can ensure a seamless and bug-free visitor experience.
ProfessionalServices.CrashAnalyticsFeature01: Resolve crashes efficiently with detailed insights into bug locations, visitors’ interactions and visitors’ device information.
ProfessionalServices.CrashAnalyticsFeature03: Elevate your websiteʼs performance with real-time crash alerts and scheduled reports to stay informed and ready to resolve bugs quickly.
ProfessionalServices.CustomReportsFeature01: Create analytics reports customised to your specific business goals and KPIs, ensuring they focus on the most relevant data.
ProfessionalServices.CustomReportsFeature02: Drill down into specific data for deeper insights into visitor behaviour and engagement.
ProfessionalServices.CustomReportsFeature03: Save time and resources by automating report generation, enabling real-time monitoring, and providing cost-effective analytics solutions without the need for third-party tools.
ProfessionalServices.FormAnalyticsFeature01: Understand how visitors engage with your forms to find areas of improvement.
ProfessionalServices.FormAnalyticsFeature02: Identify common visitor errors and validation issues within your forms, to enhance visitor satisfaction and conversion rates.
ProfessionalServices.FormAnalyticsFeature03: Gain deeper insights into how different visitor groups interact with your forms and tailor your strategies accordingly.
ProfessionalServices.FunnelsFeature01: Identify and address drop-off points to improve conversion rates.
ProfessionalServices.FunnelsFeature02: Analyse visitor behaviour based on various criteria, and get valuable insights into how different visitor groups interact with your site.
ProfessionalServices.FunnelsFeature03: Make informed decisions by identifying optimisation opportunities, enhancing visitor engagement, and driving revenue growth through a deeper understanding of visitor journeys.
ProfessionalServices.HeatmapsFeature01: Get visual representations of visitor interactions on your website, making it easy to understand how visitors engage with your content.
ProfessionalServices.HeatmapsFeature02: Get actionable data to optimise your website's layout, content placement, and visitor experience.
ProfessionalServices.HeatmapsFeature03: Identify and address visitor behaviour patterns, to increase conversion rates and achieve better results from your digital efforts.
ProfessionalServices.MediaAnalyticsFeature01: Get detailed insights into visitor engagement with audio and video content, to help you understand what resonates with your audience.
ProfessionalServices.MediaAnalyticsFeature02: Start fine-tuning your content strategy right away, no complex configurations required.
ProfessionalServices.MediaAnalyticsFeature03: See who, how much, and which parts of your media visitors have consumed and which content contributes the most value to your business.
ProfessionalServices.SessionRecordingsFeature01: See how visitors interact with your site in real-time and uncover valuable insights to improve visitor experience.
ProfessionalServices.SessionRecordingsFeature02: Identify barriers and successful visitor journeys, leading to higher conversion rates.
ProfessionalServices.SessionRecordingsFeature03: Gain in-depth insights into how visitors engage with specific content, forms, or elements, to tailor your content and design to better meet visitor preferences.
